content.p: Cookies help us to give you the best experience on our website. You can change your cookie settings if you wish. Otherwise we'll assume you're OK to continue.OKSee our policy Events and seminars are an important part of the school. They reflect academic research interests within the school and introduce our undergraduate students to a cross-section of UK research in life sciences. A highlight of our seminar programme is the annual Ransom Lecture, which is delivered by an international figure whose work bridges the divide between fundamental research and medicine. If you would like to be on the mailing list for our seminar programme please contact LS-MarketingComms@nottingham.ac.uk. View our upcoming and previous Ransom Lectures
